mapper.sql: GAME_ID, DRAW_ID, DRAW_NM, SAL_STR, SAL_END, CSH_STR, CSH_END, KENO_ID, KENO_NM, K_SAL_ST, K_SAL_ED, CHK_FLG, CHK_TIM, DOW_PRZ, PRZ_AMT, TOT_AMT, DIF_FLG, DIF_AMT, PAY_FLG, PAY_AMT, FLW_CTL, CLR_TIM, RTN_TIM, XFE_FLG
mapper.insert:
insert into gdeupsb.GDEUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL
GAME_ID,
DRAW_ID,
DRAW_NM,
SAL_STR,
SAL_END,
CSH_STR,
CSH_END,
KENO_ID,
KENO_NM,
K_SAL_ST,
K_SAL_ED,
CHK_FLG,
CHK_TIM,
DOW_PRZ,
PRZ_AMT,
TOT_AMT,
DIF_FLG,
DIF_AMT,
PAY_FLG,
PAY_AMT,
FLW_CTL,
CLR_TIM,
RTN_TIM,
XFE_FLG,
#{gameId,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{drawId,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{drawNm,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{salStr,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{salEnd,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{cshStr,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{cshEnd,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{kenoId,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{kenoNm,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{kSalSt,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{kSalEd,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{chkFlg,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{chkTim,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{dowPrz,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{przAmt,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{totAmt,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{difFlg,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{difAmt,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{payFlg,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{payAmt,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{flwCtl,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{clrTim,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{rtnTim,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{xfeFlg,jdbcType=CHAR},
mapper.update:
update gdeupsb.GDEUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL
DRAW_NM = #{drawNm,jdbcType=CHAR},
SAL_STR = #{salStr,jdbcType=CHAR},
SAL_END = #{salEnd,jdbcType=CHAR},
CSH_STR = #{cshStr,jdbcType=CHAR},
CSH_END = #{cshEnd,jdbcType=CHAR},
KENO_ID = #{kenoId,jdbcType=CHAR},
KENO_NM = #{kenoNm,jdbcType=CHAR},
K_SAL_ST = #{kSalSt,jdbcType=CHAR},
K_SAL_ED = #{kSalEd,jdbcType=CHAR},
CHK_FLG = #{chkFlg,jdbcType=CHAR},
CHK_TIM = #{chkTim,jdbcType=CHAR},
DOW_PRZ = #{dowPrz,jdbcType=CHAR},
PRZ_AMT = #{przAmt,jdbcType=CHAR},
TOT_AMT = #{totAmt,jdbcType=CHAR},
DIF_FLG = #{difFlg,jdbcType=CHAR},
DIF_AMT = #{difAmt,jdbcType=CHAR},
PAY_FLG = #{payFlg,jdbcType=CHAR},
PAY_AMT = #{payAmt,jdbcType=CHAR},
FLW_CTL = #{flwCtl,jdbcType=CHAR},
CLR_TIM = #{clrTim,jdbcType=CHAR},
RTN_TIM = #{rtnTim,jdbcType=CHAR},
XFE_FLG = #{xfeFlg,jdbcType=CHAR},
where GAME_ID = #{gameId,jdbcType=CHAR} and DRAW_ID = #{drawId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from gdeupsb.GDEUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL
where
(GAME_ID=#{item.gameId,jdbcType=CHAR} AND DRAW_ID=#{item.drawId,jdbcType=CHAR})

select
from ${EUPS_SCHEMA}.GDEUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL where (SAL_END < #{cshStr,jdbcType=CHAR} OR (KSAL_ED < #{cshStr,jdbcType=CHAR} AND GAME_ID='7')) AND FLW_CTL='10' AND KENO_ID!='AAAAA' ORDER BY GAME_ID DESC,DRAW_ID ASC

select
from ${EUPS_SCHEMA}.GDEUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL where GAME_ID=#{gameId,jdbcType=CHAR} and DRAW_ID=#{drawId,jdbcType=CHAR} and KENO_ID!=#{kenoId,jdbcType=CHAR} and PRZ_AMT=#{przAmt,jdbcType=CHAR} and FLW_CTL!=#{flwCtl,jdbcType=CHAR}

select
from ${EUPS_SCHEMA}.GDEUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL where PRZ_AMT!='' and TOT_AMT!='' and CHK_FLG='2' and FLW_CTL='10' and KENO_ID in ('','AAAAA') and (DIF_AMT='' or DIF_FLG='')

select COALESCE(sum(bigint(PrzAmt)),0) przSumAmt from LotDrwTbl where GAME_ID=#{gameId,jdbcType=CHAR} and DRAW_ID=#{drawId,jdbcType=CHAR} and KENO_ID!=#{kenoId,jdbcType=CHAR} and PRZ_AMT=#{przAmt,jdbcType=CHAR} and FLW_CTL!=#{flwCtl,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.update: update ${EUPS_SCHEMA}.GDEUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL a set a.PRZ_AMT=#{przSumAmt,jdbcType=CHAR}, a.FLW_CTL='10', a.PAY_AMT = (select cast(sum(bigint(case when b.PAY_AMT = '' then '0' else b.PAY_AMT end)) as char(15)) from ${EUPS_SCHEMA}.GDEUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL b where a.GAME_ID = b.GAME_ID and a.DRAW_ID = b.DRAW_ID and b.KENO_ID != 'AAAAA'), a.PAY_FLG = ( select (case when exists(select 'Y' from ${EUPS_SCHEMA}.GDEUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL c where c.GAME_ID = a.GAME_ID and c.DRAW_ID = a.DRAW_ID and c.KENO_ID != 'AAAAA' and c.PAY_FLG = '1') then '1' else '0' end) from ${EUPS_SCHEMA}.GDEUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL d where d.GAME_ID=a.GAME_ID and d.DRAW_ID=a.DRAW_ID and d.KENO_ID='AAAAA') where a.GAME_ID=#{gameId,jdbcType=CHAR} and a.DRAW_ID=#{drawId,jdbcType=CHAR} and a.KENO_ID = 'AAAAA'
mapper.select: select COALESCE(sum(bigint(PAY_AMT)),0) TolPayAmt from gdeupsb.GDEUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL where GAME_ID=#{gameId,jdbcType=CHAR} and SubStr(SAL_END, 1, 8) < #{salEnd,jdbcType=CHAR} and PAY_FLG= '1' and PAY_AMT != '' and CHK_FLG in ('2', '3')

select COALESCE(sum(bigint(case when DIF_FLG='1' then DIF_AMT else '-'||DIF_AMT end)),0) TolDifAmt from gdeupsb.GDEUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL where GAME_ID=#{gameId,jdbcType=CHAR} and SubStr(SAL_END, 1, 8) < #{salEnd,jdbcType=CHAR} and CHK_FLG = '2' and DIF_AMT != ''

SELECT 'Y' YN FROM table(values(1)) as annoy WHERE EXISTS( SELECT 'Y' FROM gdeupsb.GDEUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL WHERE GAME_ID=#{gameId,jdbcType=CHAR} and SubStr(SAL_END, 1, 8) < #{salEnd,jdbcType=CHAR} and (CHK_FLG in ('','0','1') or FLW_CTL != '10') and KENO_ID in ('','AAAAA'))
mapper.update: update gdeupsb.GDEUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL set CHK_FLG = '3', CLR_TIM=#{clrTim,jdbcType=CHAR} where GAME_ID=#{gameId,jdbcType=CHAR} and SubStr(SAL_END, 1, 8) < #{salEnd,jdbcType=CHAR} and CHK_FLG ='2' and (DIF_AMT != '' or DIF_AMT!='0')
mapper.select: select * from gdeupsb.GDEUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL where GAME_ID =#{GameId} and SubStr(SAL_END, 1, 8) < #{ClrDat} and (CHK_FLG != '3' or PAY_FLG not in ('0','2')) and KENO_ID in ('','AAAAA') order by GAME_ID, DRAW_ID asc
select count(*) from gdeupsb.GDEUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL where GAME_ID =#{GameId} and SubStr(SAL_END, 1, 8) < #{ClrDat} and (CHK_FLG != '3' or PAY_FLG not in ('0','2')) and KENO_ID in ('','AAAAA')

select * from gdeupsb.GDEUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL where GAME_ID = #{GameId} and (DRAW_ID = #{DrawId} or DRAW_ID = '') and (DRAW_NM = #{DrawNm} or DRAW_NM = '') and (KENO_ID = #{KenoId} or KENO_ID = '') and (KENO_NM = #{KenoNm} or KENO_NM = '') and (SubStr(SAL_STR,1,8) = #{SalStr} or SAL_STR = '') and (SubStr(SAL_END,1,8) = #{SalEnd} or SAL_END = '') and (CHK_FLG = #{ChkFlg} or CHK_FLG = '') and (PAY_FLG = #{PayFlg} or PAY_FLG = '')
and FLW_CTL != '10'
and TOT_AMT != '' and TOT_AMT != '0'
and PRZ_AMT != '' and PRZ_AMT != '0'
order by GAME_ID, DRAW_ID asc

select count(*) from gdeupsb.GDEUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL where GAME_ID = #{GameId} and (DRAW_ID = #{DrawId} or DRAW_ID = '') and (DRAW_NM = #{DrawNm} or DRAW_NM = '') and (KENO_ID = #{KenoId} or KENO_ID = '') and (KENO_NM = #{KenoNm} or KENO_NM = '') and (SubStr(SAL_STR,1,8) = #{SalStr} or SAL_STR = '') and (SubStr(SAL_END,1,8) = #{SalEnd} or SAL_END = '') and (CHK_FLG = #{ChkFlg} or CHK_FLG = '') and (PAY_FLG = #{PayFlg} or PAY_FLG = '')
and FLW_CTL != '10'
and TOT_AMT != '' and TOT_AMT != '0'
and PRZ_AMT != '' and PRZ_AMT != '0'
select * from gdeupsb.GDEUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL where GAME_ID= #{GameId} and SubStr(SAL_END, 1, 8)=#{SalEnd}
SELECT 'Y' YN FROM table(values(1)) as annoy WHERE EXISTS( SELECT 'Y' FROM gdeupsb.GDEUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL WHERE GAME_ID= #{GameId} and DRAW_ID=#{drawId})

select
from ${BBIPADM_SCHEMA}.GDEUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL
FLW_CTL='0' and GAME_ID=#{gameId} and KENO_ID != 'AAAAA' and K_SAL_ST < #{lotTime} and K_SAL_ED >#{lotTime} order by K_SAL_ST asc
FLW_CTL='0' and GAME_ID=#{gameId} and KENO_ID != 'AAAAA' and SAL_STR < #{lotTime} and SAL_END >#{lotTime} order by SAL_STR asc
fetch first 1 rows only

select COALESCE(sum(bigint(PRZ_AMT)),0) przSumAmt from gdeupsb.GDEUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL where GAME_ID =#{gameId,jdbcType=CHAR} AND DRAW_ID=#{drawId,jdbcType=CHAR} AND KENO_ID !='AAAAA' and PRZ_AMT !='' and FLW_CTL ='10'

select GAME_ID, DRAW_ID, KENO_ID, TOT_AMT, PRZ_AMT from gdeupsb.GDEUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL where PRZ_AMT!='' and TOT_AMT!='' and CHK_FLG='2' and FLW_CTL='10' and KENO_ID in ('','AAAAA') and (DIF_AMT='' or DIF_FLG='')
mapper.update: update gdeupsb.GDEUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL a set a.PRZ_AMT=#{przAmt,jdbcType=CHAR}, a.FLW_CTL='10', a.PAY_AMT = (select cast(sum(bigint(case when b.PAY_AMT = '' then '0' else b.PAY_AMT end)) as char(15)) from gdeupsb.GDEUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL b where a.GAME_ID = b.GAME_ID and a.DRAW_ID = b.DRAW_ID and b.KENO_ID != 'AAAAA'), a.PAY_FLG = (select (case when exists(select 'Y' from gdeupsb.GDEUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL c where c.GAME_ID = a.GAME_ID and c.DRAW_ID = a.DRAW_ID and c.KENO_ID != 'AAAAA' and c.PAY_FLG = '1') then '1' else '0' end) from gdeupsb.GDEUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL d where d.GAME_ID=a.GAME_ID and d.DRAW_ID=a.DRAW_ID and d.KENO_ID='AAAAA') where GAME_ID = #{gameId,jdbcType=CHAR} and DRAW_ID = #{drawId,jdbcType=CHAR} and KENO_ID ='AAAAA'
mapper.select: select GAME_ID, DRAW_ID from gdeupsb.GDEUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL where KENO_ID='AAAAA' and PRZ_AMT='' and FLW_CTL !='10'
select count(*) unPrzCnt from gdeupsb.GDEUPS_LOT_DRW_TBL where GAME_ID =#{gameId,jdbcType=CHAR} AND DRAW_ID=#{drawId,jdbcType=CHAR} AND KENO_ID !='AAAAA' and PRZ_AMT='' and FLW_CTL !='10'
